p.s: The summer is a great time of the year to become organized .
Becoming organized may be easier said than done , but this article should help you to organize your lifestyle in an easy way .

item.s: Decide what needs to be organized .
Take a couple of days to create a big list of things you need to become more organized at .

figure.rend: Get Organized over the Summer Step 1.jpg

item.s: Ask your family members and friends for some tips on what to put on this list so you can have absolutely everything written down .
If you ca n't think of everything right away , go ahead and take a couple of hours for a break .
When you come back to the list after having a break , you will probably find yourself capable of listing new ways of organizing .
Keep in mind that if your handwriting is very sloppy or hard to read , you may go ahead and type the list on a computer if you have the access to one .
Organize the small things first .
Do you need to help your children organize their toys ?
Try to do things similar to that concept first .
These should be the easy things on your list that only take a small amount of time to accomplish .

figure.rend: Get Organized over the Summer Step 2.jpg

item.s: If the task will take over five hours to do , try to do that task later on in the summer .
Move on to the big tasks .
After all of the small tasks have been completed , it is time to move on to bigger tasks .
These tasks will definitely take up more time , and if you can only accomplish one task a day , that is fine .
Your goal should be to try to accomplish at least five big tasks a week until you are finished .

figure.rend: Get Organized over the Summer Step 3.jpg

item.s: Do a major cleaning of your house .
Go through all of your drawers , closets , etc. to make sure you are positive of where everything is .
Donate the things you do n't need or use anymore .

figure.rend: Get Organized over the Summer Step 4.jpg

item.s: Try to avoid putting random objects that do n't belong together in one area , as this will be confusing when you are looking for something .
Instead , try categorizing all of the items into separate containers based on what they do .
For example , keep all of your cleaning supplies ( broom , dust pans , etc. ) in one closet of your house .
Have your schedule figured out .
Besides doing the organizing of your home , you will also need to organize your life on a daily basis .
Try not to plan too far ahead when doing this , though , for you probably do not know what events will be occurring in the winter .
Instead , plan your schedule week by week in a planner or on a calendar .

figure.rend: Get Organized over the Summer Step 5.jpg

item.s: Make sure to write down where the event will be taking place , the time of the event , what days the events are on , and other important information .
Do n't worry about rushing this process .
If you decide to hurry through everything , you will regret it when things are still a mess later on .
